unnormalised: AIIMS Delhi reports a spike in dengue cases, with OPD seeing ~150 patients daily. Dr. Sharma, head of Internal Medicine, mentioned a 20% increase compared to last month. Concerns are rising as monsoons continue, creating breeding grounds for mosquitoes.
normalised: A-I-I-M-S Delhi reports a spike in dengue cases, with O-P-D seeing approximately one hundred and fifty patients daily. Doctor Sharma, head of Internal Medicine, mentioned a twenty percent increase compared to last month. Concerns are rising as monsoons continue, creating breeding grounds for mosquitoes.

unnormalised: Health officials advise wearing full sleeves and using mosquito repellents like Odomos. The local municipality is conducting fogging drives in affected areas, especially near J.J. colonies and areas with poor sanitation. Remember to prevent water stagnation in pots & tires.
normalised: Health officials advise wearing full sleeves and using mosquito repellents like Odomos. The local municipality is conducting fogging drives in affected areas, especially near J-J colonies and areas with poor sanitation. Remember to prevent water stagnation in pots and tires.

unnormalised: Symptoms include high fever (102-104Â°F), severe headache, and joint pain. Don't self-medicate! Consult a doctor immediately if you experience these. Tests like NS1 antigen & CBC are recommended.
normalised: Symptoms include high fever one hundred and two to one hundred and four degree Fahrenheit, severe headache, and joint pain. Don't self-medicate! Consult a doctor immediately if you experience these. Tests like N-S-one antigen and C-B-C are recommended.

unnormalised: Stay safe this monsoon, folks! Dengue can be prevented with a lil' caution and awareness. Let's keep our surroundings clean to avoid mosquito breeding. Remember to follow all the guidelines issues by the MoHFW.
normalised: Stay safe this monsoon, folks! Dengue can be prevented with a little caution and awareness. Let's keep our surroundings clean to avoid mosquito breeding. Remember to follow all the guidelines issued by the M-o-H-F-W.
